person.persName: Emry W. Easley (Henry County engineer and captain, 54th KY Vol Mounted Infantry)

body.p: Residence: Pleasureville post office, Henry County, KY. A Kentucky-born engineer. Married Catharine. Captain of Company G, 54th KY Volunteer Mounted Infantry. Enrolled 23 Sep 1864. Mustered in 5 Oct 1864, Louisville, KY. Mustered out 1 Sep 1865, Louisville, KY.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 547.
"Mr. and Mrs. E.W. Easley and Their Nine Children," Louisville Courier-Journal, 12 Sep 1903, p. 12. ProQuest Historical Newspapers.
